I'm Taylor Brown.

I'm from Kansas. I live in Los Angeles.

I live a double life.

Work

I'm an SEO Specialist for Tribune Publishing (now tronc). I manage SEO for the L.A. Times, Chicago Tribune, Baltimore Sun and more publications.

Not Work

I'm a comedy person. I've studied at The Second City, iO, The Annoyance and UCB. I write scripts and make short comedy videos for the internet.
